name: Art Mostofi's Webpage
tagline: Meditation and Exercise Timer, Automatic Yogurt Maker and much more!
body:
### Welcome to Art Mostofi's Webpage.
I created the app for myself as a tool during my physical therapy rehabilitation for back pain. I expanded it little by little to what you see today.

Please let me know if you find any issues. I also forward to hearing your suggestions on how to improve the app.  

### Support or Contact
Please contact mostofiit@gmail.com for any support questions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
